TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit NodeRangeIterator extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Iterates over the singleton node if the starting node is the same node as the ending node. Iterates to the end of the document if the starting node is after the ending node or is in a different document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Iterate over the nodes in document order, beginning with the start node through all content-typed nodes that follow the starting node, until the ending node is reached. Nodes that do not match the predicate test are filtered out.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Create (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator start, System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter filter, System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator end);

.method public hidebysig instance void Create(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator start, class System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter filter, class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator end) cil managed

Docs.param: Test expression that determines whether a node is to be filtered out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method iterates over the nodes in document order, beginning with the start node through all content-typed nodes that follow the starting node, until the ending node is reached. Nodes that do not match the predicate test are filtered out.
## Remarks The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Positions the iterator on the next node.
Docs.returns: if the next node exists; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the next node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NodeRangeIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
